description: You can use a characters like ʃƪ or 人 to make the emote look like it’s clasping its hands together as it goes in for a kiss. This makes the kiss appear especially darling and it looks like a gesture full of love. These clasping hands can be put on either the left or the right side of the emoticon so that it can face either direction. I don’t know why, but I can’t help but imagine these emoticons are standing on their toes.  (ʃƪ ˘ ³˘) (ʃƪ˘ﻬ˘) (人´З`) （ʃƪ＾3＾） (ʃƪΦзΦ) |人°з°| (人^з^)-☆ (ʃƪ〃ﾟ3ﾟ〃) （ʃƪ๑・౩・๑） (´ε｀ ʃƪ)♡ （￣ε￣ʃƪ） (ΘεΘʃƪ)
title: Clasping Hands
